description.en-US:
Boxel Rebound is a fast pace arcade game where you jump over obstacles to score the lowest time.

Features:
- Over 50 levels with 5 unique themes
- Unlockable skins
- Level Builder
- Community level browser

Changelog:

Version 1.8.0.5
+Added a community Discord link

Version 1.8.0.2
+Fixed rewards page timer

Version 1.8.0.0
+Added speedrun clock to fullscreen mode
+Replaced "Points" with total time

Version 1.7.8.0
+Added auto-jump (Hold right-click)

Version 1.7.6.7
+Added keyboard shortcuts (R = Reset level, E = Exit level)

Version 1.7.6.3
+Added the ability to unlock skins by beating the final zone levels (ex: 10, 20, 30, etc.)

Version 1.7.6.2
+Temporarily disabled cloud storage (building a new way to backup data manually).

Version 1.7.6.1
+Fixed rewards not saving to the Google Cloud

Version 1.7.6
+Added a rewards page for users to expand features for free.
+Removed Boxel Rebound Pro button (Google is removing all sales in early 2021). If you have already purchased Boxel Rebound Pro, all Pro features will remain available to you forever.

Version 1.7.3.7 - June 7, 2020
+Added community levels again (keep them clean ya'll).
+Yeeted "tabs" permission (We DO NOT want to know your browsing history). This was originally added to collect basic user behaviors (clicks, installs, uninstalls etc.)

Version 1.7.3.3 - May 7, 2020
+Added fullscreen mode again LOL

Version 1.7.3.0 - May 7, 2020
+Removed community browser (Google doesn't like tabs)
+Removed fullscreen mode (Google doesn't like tabs)

Version 1.7.2.0 - January 23, 2020
+Made level 41-50 extra hard lol

Version 1.7.1.1 - December 16, 2019
+Updated "Hurdle Hell" (Level 36) to be difficult again
+Updated resize block, it now resets speed blocks (credit: Lollipop)
+Fixed home page bug when pressing space bar (credit: Google A.I.)

Version 1.7.0.0 - November 28, 2019
+Added new physics for arrow blocks (low gravity, high gravity, slow-mo, fast-mo)
+Added 10 new levels (50 total)

Version 1.6.1.0 - November 20, 2019
+Added privacy policy to help you learn more about your data.

Version 1.6.0.9 - November 18, 2019
+Optimize community levels page with new server cache system.
+Increased download/upload limit to encourage more submissions.

Version 1.6.0 - November 12, 2019
+Added a new free skin - click the link on the extension pop-up, or community page for more info
+Increased performance for player skins. Vectors are now cached properly.

Version 1.5.9.6 - November 6, 2019
+Added tips to community levels
+Added censor for reported levels

Version 1.5.9.3 - October 29, 2019
+Added user tokens to improve reporting system.

Version 1.5.9.2 - October 28, 2019
+Added "report" button to help clean up the community levels.

Version 1.5.9 - October 24, 2019
+Added game to community page to quickly try out other levels.

Version 1.5.8.8 - October 24, 2019
+Added "easy" and "expert" filter to community page.

Version 1.5.8.7 - October 23, 2019
+Added "completed" counter for community levels.

Version 1.5.8.6 - October 23, 2019
+Added search box for level codes.
+Updated editor theme.

Version 1.5.8.2 - October 22, 2019
+Added new "hot" filter to community page.
+Added color to map preview.

Version 1.5.8.1 - October 21, 2019
+Added community page for recent or popular levels.

Version 1.5.8 - October 21, 2019
+Updated level sharing database. It's super fast now.
+Updated level editor icons.

Version 1.5.7.4 - October 17, 2019
+Added 4 new skins (kitty, doggo, mouse, birb)
+Added skins to pause menu (previously numbers)

Version 1.5.7.3 - October 2, 2019
+Updated UI

Version 1.5.7.1 - September 18, 2019
+Fixed "Fast Mode" not working in "Fullscreen" mode.

Version 1.5.7 - September 18, 2019
+Added "Fast Mode" option.

Version 1.5.6.2 - June 25, 2019
+Experimenting with a speed option. No new features yet...

Version 1.5.6 - May 18, 2019
+Added auto sync to pro accounts. High scores and custom level data will now automatically update on all your computers.

Version 1.5.5.3 - May 13, 2019
+Fixed a bug that caused custom levels to disappear

Version 1.5.5 - April 30, 2019
+Added 4 new custom skin options for Pro users

Version 1.5.4 - April 12, 2019
+Added an option to download or upload level files (unlimited for free account)
+Increased default max custom levels to 3

Version 1.5 - April 5, 2019
+Added Boxel Rebound Pro option. Pro players can now share/download an unlimited amount of levels with friends!

Version 1.4 - April 3, 2019
+Added 10 new levels from hell!

Version 1.3.8.2 - March 19, 2019
+Working on new levels. Nothing new yet!

Version 1.3.8 - March 19, 2019
+Add limits for uploads and downloads.

Version 1.3.7.2 - March 9th, 2019
+Add Amazon promo to help pay for the server.

Version 1.3.6.2 - March 1st, 2019
+Update level compression to UTF16 format

Version 1.3.5 - February 28th, 2019
+Update font support for older machines

Version 1.3.3 - February 27th, 2019
+Added LZ-String compression for level sharing. Our server has reached the monthly download limit, so this update should help prevent future down-times.

Version 1.3.2 - February 26th, 2019
+Updated soundtrack because the previous one was awful

Version 1.3.0 - February 26th, 2019
+Added a message box for live updates from the developers

Version 1.2.9 - August 7rd, 2018
+Updated points UI on home screen
+Updated player color to white on blue levels

Version 1.2.8 - August 3rd, 2018
+Include data tracking

Version 1.2.7 - July 18th, 2018
+Add total points to the top of home screen

summary.en-US: Play over 50 levels of box-jumping madness! Design and share your own levels.
